thag1.21:1.1: This applies to every other unwholesome state. Being [passionate towards passion](https://suttas.hillsidehermitage.org/?q=thag2.36), irritated by irritation, and distracted by distraction is the problem. A defilement cannot be a defilement unless craving is present, and craving is not *in* whatever is felt, perceived, or cognized. Without understanding this, [one cannot develop the mind](https://suttas.hillsidehermitage.org/?q=an1.51-60#an1.51:1.1-an1.51:1.4).
